Windlord:

"You're wrong as usual" replied Windlord "What're the things that 
Maximals Belive???? if you're a maximal you must know that loyalty, 
frienship, and help coudn't be hiring... 'cause they came from 
spark... no one can buy it... every one have to work to deserve 
them..."

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Soulstice Omega" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> Burning Hammer was hit by most of the shots. One dislodging the 
arrow and
> knocking it across the field.
> 
> Burning Hammer: I was hired, what do you expect? Everyone has to 
make a
> living, and I was hired by the Maximal cause to destroy. Maximals 
can be far
> more diabolical than you know. If a Maximal has to, they will 
resort to
> such. Never push a Maximal too far! Ha!...
>
